a.h1: Childress ISD Challenging and Inspiring Students Daily

li.a: Notice of Deadline to File Applications for a Place on the Ballot

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: CES packet pick up and drop off of finished packets will be tomorrow, April 6th. Pick up times will be 7:00 - 8:00, 11:30 - 12:30 and 5:00 - 6:00. Work printed off by parents may be taken to the filing cabinet at the CES circle drive.

CES packet pick up and drop off of finished packets will be Monday, April 6th. Pick up times will be 7:00 - 8:00, 11:30 - 12:30 and 5:00 - 6:00. Please bring back library books at this time. Put student's name and teacher's name on finished packets.
There are meals left. If you would like one, go by the Junior High Cafeteria to pick it up.
CES paper and online packets need to be turned in April 6th or when the next packets are issued. Please return all library books at that time, as well.
Please check the Childress ISD website Update Center for breaking news!

p.a: Event: Lady Cats & Bobcats vs Nocona
